entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
